meanings.sent1: The storm was so lossy that many trees fell down.
meanings.sent2: The company experienced a lossy quarter due to decreased sales.
meanings.sent3: It was a lossy decision to leave my umbrella at home on such a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: Her lossy memory made it difficult for her to recall important details.
meanings.sent5: The lossy feeling of loneliness crept in as the sun set.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or causing the loss of data or quality
meanings.sent1: The old video game console had a lossy display with blurry graphics.
meanings.sent2: Compressing the image file resulted in a lossy reduction of quality.
meanings.sent3: The lossy internet connection made streaming videos a frustrating experience.
meanings.sent4: The lossy audio file sounded distorted and muffled.
meanings.sent5: The lossy photocopy made it hard to read the text.
